results.definition: state of being gratified or satisfied

examples: we were unable to get satisfaction from the local store

results.definition: act of fulfilling a desire or need or appetite
examples: the satisfaction of their demand for better services

results.definition: (law) the payment of a debt or fulfillment of an obligation
examples: the full and final satisfaction of the claim

results.definition: the contentment one feels when one has fulfilled a desire, need, or expectation
examples: the chef tasted the sauce with great satisfaction
